snippet: Three exhibitions of potato-themed art, curated by Jeffrey Allen Price at the Islip Museum, cover the spectrum, from the ridiculous to the socially relevant.
abstract: Three exhibitions of potato-themed art, curated by Jeffrey Allen Price at the Islip Museum, cover a spectrum from the ridiculous to the socially relevant (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Three exhibitions of potato-themed art, curated by Jeffrey Allen Price at the Islip Museum, cover the spectrum, from the ridiculous to the socially relevant.

headline.seo: Three Exhibitions Elevate the Lowly Potato at the Islip Museum
headline.main: The Potato, as Art and Instrument
headline.print_headline: The Potato, as Art And Instrument
